means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to ancient Boeotia or its people or to the dialect spoken there in classical times;

auth_sentence.content: But Lichas, a prominent Spartan, thought of a way round the ban - he entered the chariot race as a Boeotian.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Lichas, a prominent Spartan, thought of a way round the ban - he entered the chariot race as a Boeotian.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Lichas, a prominent Spartan, thought of a way round the ban - he entered the chariot race as a Boeotian.
